title: Ticket #7510: Add slot ID to starters' shared port IDs
description:
Adding the slot ID to the starter's shared port ID would make, among other things, lines like the following more convenient, because you wouldn't have to grep for job ID 687.0; you could just go to the appropriate StarterLog.slotX file directly. 

040 (718.000.000) 2019-11-06 14:46:02 Started transferring input files
        Transferring to host: <75.100.84.83:9618?addrs=75.100.84.83-9618&alias=azaphrael.org&noUDP&sock=starter_1361_b290_1>
remarks:
2020-Apr-10 07:46:37 by tim:
Bulk change of target version from v080906 to v080907 using ticket-target-mover.
